page.title: 15THE MAYOR OF SUNDERLAND
page.content: On Mon.17th June 1985 the Mayor of Sunderland,Mr.Ralph Baxter, visited our school. He is a new Mayor and he lives in S.Hylton. We asked him some questions. We discovered that he became Mayor on May 15th 1985. He is Mayor for one year. He worked in the shipyards before he was Mayor. S.Hylton school was the first school he had visited. He is the first Mayor of Sunderland to live in S.Hylton and he has lived here for 18 yrs. He thinks that the Domesday survey is an excellent idea because he says that until you know where you come from it is difficult to know where you are going. He describes his job as Mayor as promoting the area of Sunderland to encourage trade. His job keeps him busy nearly every day of the week but in his spare time he reads.
